item.description:
Join Colleen for an awesome class that will feature Zumba, belly dancing, Bollywood, salsa, merengue, cumbia, reggaetone, and cha cha! Even if you have 2 left feet and/or are new to dance... this class will teach you to move!


Colleen has taught dance and fitness for over 25 years. Now she brings her experience and technique to Zumba! Join her for an energized journey in dance fitness from Latin America to the Middle East. Fun, easy to follow, and filled with a wide variety of funkiness and athleticism. This class will be sure to please all ages and levels of fitness.


Classes are $12. * cash or check * credit card * slight fee for usage.

College Students: We know you're on a tight budget, that's why for a limited time Zumba with Jess is offering discounted classes on Thursday nights for cash strapped college students! Half off on Thursdays. College ID required.

group.name: Zumba® with Jess in Union Square

item.name: Zumba with Colleen
